products.title: Products
products.subtitle: View your tracked products
products.noProductsDescription: You can add your products using the "Add to Heybe" button via the extension

empty.title: No products yet !
empty.description: Your products will be automatically added via the extension

products.deleteAllConfirmMessage: This action cannot be undone. All your products will be permanently deleted.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Product
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{productName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

extension.notInstalled: Extension not installed. Please install the extension to use the feature.

setup.title: Setup
setup.installDescription: Install the Heybe extension to your browser
setup.permissionsDescription: The following permissions need to be granted for the extension to work properly:

chromePermissions.title: Chrome Permissions
steps: Download and install Heybe extension from Chrome Web Store

bravePermissions.title: Brave Permissions
steps: Download and install Heybe extension from Chrome Web Store

edgePermissions.title: Edge Permissions
steps: Download and install Heybe extension from Microsoft Edge Add-ons store

firefoxPermissions.title: Firefox Permissions
steps: Download and install Heybe extension from Firefox Add-ons store

safariPermissions.title: Safari Permissions
steps: Download and install Heybe extension from App Store
